product_description: With a shape resembling that of a cauliflower, Brocoli's have clusters of small, tight flower heads. These heads turn bright green on cooking and tastes slightly bitter.

Onion is a vegetable which is almost like a staple in Indian food. This is also known to be one of the essential ingredients of raw salads. They come in different colors like white, red or yellow and are quite in demand in cold salads and hot soups.

Potatoes are nutrient-dense, non-fattening and have reasonable amount of calories. Include them in your regular meals so that the body receives a good supply of carbohydrates, dietary fibers and essential minerals such as copper, magnesium, and iron. In India, potatoes are probably the second-most consumed vegetables after onions.

A popular sweet-tasting root vegetable, Carrots are narrow and cone shaped. They have thick, fleshy, deeply colored root, which grows underground, and feathery green leaves that emerge above the ground.
tomatoes are partly sour and partly sweet and contain many seeds inside which are edible. The red colour present in tomatoes is due to lycopene, an anti-oxidant.
Ladies' finger is a green vegetable with a tip at the end and a lighter green head, which is inedible and to be thrown away. It tastes mild and slightly grassy.
These edible ruby red roots are smooth and bulbous and have the highest sugar content than any other vegetable.

green chillies are meant to send shivers up your spine - literally! These chillies are grown in special organic farms, from where they are packaged in hygienic and clean environments to ensure purity. These green chillies are definitely a staple in your refrigerator to create aromatic delicacies.

beans are smaller than common green beans and have a soft, velvety pod. Quite fleshy for their size, only tiny seeds inhabit these delicate pods. French beans are sweet, tender and wonderfully crispy. Due to naturally growing methods, they are free from chemical residues. They are used in curries, soups, stir-fry with rice, noodles and salads.

Lemon is a popular fruit that is used in small quantities to add flavor to food and brings joy to the palate and bliss to life. Lemons give flavor to baked goods, sauces, salad dressings, marinades, drinks, and desserts.

Coriander leaves are green, fragile with a decorative appearance. They contain minimal aroma and have a spicy sweet taste. Now do not bother wasting time cutting off the roots as we value your money and time and provide you the freshest leafy edible parts .

Firm and fibrous ginger roots are stretched with multiple fingers that have light to dark tan skin and rings on it and is aromatic, spicy and pungent. The flavour gets intensified when the ginger is dried and lessens when cooked.
Garlic is made of several heads wrapped in thin whitish layers. They are firm and have a mild flavour. Once crushed, they emit a strong and pungent aroma.

Curry leaves are an essential element of Indian cooking style where numerous of the traditional and modern recipes are imperfect without curry leaves. These are used as tasting agent in food for its different taste.

Relish juicy, crunchy and mildly salty flavoured celeries that are individually handpicked everyday by our trained farmers. Celeries have wide, green leaves attached to thick, juicy stalks joined at a common base.

The possible health benefits of consuming kale include improving blood glucose control in diabetics, lowering the risk of cancer, lowering blood pressure, improving bone health, lowering the risk of developing asthma and more.

Thai Sweet Basil. It has a sweet delicate flavor and aroma. It has shiny green, slightly serrated, narrow leaves with a sweet, anise-like scent. It has have antioxidants, anti-cancer properties, anti-viral, anti-bacterial, and anti-fungal properties.

Multi-Colored Swiss Chard contains the formula mix of hybrid and fake hybrid types. It is mild tasting and wholesome stalks cultivate in a rainbow of colors. It is a very superior resource of vitamins C, A & E, beta-carotene and the minerals zinc and manganese.

Mint leaves are tender herbs with gentle stems and have a distinct pleasant aroma, pleasing taste, cool after-sensation, and medicinal qualities.They are best used raw or added at the end of cooking in order to maintain their delicate flavor and texture.
Banganpalli are sourced from Andhra Pradesh and known for their unique sweet and rich taste. They are moderately juicy and aromatic with a maize-yellow colour.

With greenish black to smooth dark green surface,watermelons are globular in shape and are freshly picked for you directly from our farmers.The juicy, sweet and grainy textured flesh is filled with 12-14% of sugar content, making it a healthy alternative to sugary carbonated drinks. Flesh colour of these watermelons are pink to red with dark brown/black seeds.
With ruby color and an intense floral, sweet-tart flavor, the pomegranate delivers both taste and beauty. You can remove the skin and the membranes to get at the delicious fruit with nutty seeds.

Tiny and small sized, this variety is called Yelakki in Bangalore and Elaichi in Mumbai. Despite its small size, they are naturally flavoured, aromatic and sweeter compared to regular bananas. Yelakki bananas are around 3- 4 inches long and contain a thinner skin and better shelf life than Robusta bananas
Considered as most commonly grown apples in India, Shimla apples have a light red skin, juicy and crunchy flesh. We source the best apples with residue and wax free peel from the trusted growers.

Plump, smooth-skinned and indigo coloured perfect little globes of juicy berries have mostly sweet and slightly tart flavour. We have imported this fine quality, delicious tasting variety of blueberries

Kiwis are oval shaped with a brownish outer skin. The flesh is bright green and juicy with tiny, edible black seeds. With its distinct sweet-sour taste and a pleasant smell, it tastes like strawberry and honeydew melon.
Oranges, are known for their tangy sweet taste and juiciness. Oranges make the perfect snack and add a special tang to many recipes.

Green skinned and fleshy, Avocado (Butter Fruit) has a smooth texture and is widely used to make Mexican dips such as Guacamole. This exotic food is often used in the preparation of sweet and savoury dishes and can be eaten raw in salads or served with spices.

Soft and pulpy, Muskmelon has a soft consistency with a juicy texture. With thin pale green coloured skin and cluster of tiny seeds in the center, this succulent sweet tasting fruit can be used in making various shakes, salads and deserts.
Tender coconut is considered a healthy source of nutrition. It is a good refreshing drink to beat the hot summer heat and it is very low in caloric value.

Sprouts are an excellent source of antioxidants that protect us from the ongoing effects of aging and prevent cell destruction. Sprouts will be a perfect addition to your diet, because of its several nutritional constituents like vitamins and minerals. Sprouts are best when eaten raw and fresh.
Our uniformly and perfectly cut fresh ash gourds comes with a mild and soft texture. No more messy hands!
Sprouts are seeds that have been allowed to germinate into young plants. They are usually eaten raw and are available in a wide range of varieties.
Sprouts are seeds that have been allowed to germinate into young plants. They are usually eaten raw and are available in a wide range of varieties.

Aashirvaad Whole Wheat Atta has now become number one in branded packaged atta across the country. Behind every Aashirvaad pack are the Indian farmers and Aashirvaad experts who’ve made the atta with extra care. Aashirvaad prides itself in making 100% pure whole wheat atta with all its natural dietary fibres intact which ensure that you and your family receive optimum nutrition for a healthy life.
This maka peeth from the house of has shelf life of 3 months. And has no artificial colors as well as no preservatives. Offers traditionally delicious authentic taste.

Bajra flour is made from small round grains of black millet, also called bajra. The flour is greyish in colour and has a slightly nutty flavour. Since it is a heat-producing ingredient, it is commonly used in winters.

Aashirvaad Atta with Multigrains is a high fibre atta that aids digestion. It's made with the choicest grains sourced from fields across India. It's made with 6 grains – wheat, maize, oats, soya, channa & psyllium husk. Just 3 rotis fulfill 35% of your daily fibre intake. Fibre content is same as in 6 carrots or 4 beetroots. Make chapatis, paranthas, pooris that taste just like your regular atta.
Vijay Rice Flour is made from best-selected rice that is finely grounded into a fine flour. It is a common substitute for wheat flour. It is used as a thickening agent in many recipes.

Satyam Maida is a finely milled and refined wheat flour. Pure white in colour and sooth in texture, it is extensively used in making various kinds of Indian breads and several other baked confections.
Enhanced with an appetizing aroma that makes your meal more delicious than ever, Daawat Rozana Super Rice is a packet full of long-grained wonder.

Poha is a much loved and eaten snack in India. With a dash of peanuts and curry leaves, it makes for a great breakfast option. Tata Sampann thick poha can be used to make a healthy snack as it uses minimal oil while roasting and is high in fibre which is an essential part of a healthy and balanced diet.

Sona Masoori Rice is medium-grain rice, cultivated mainly in the Indian states of Andhra Pradesh. It is healthy, lightweight and has a delicious aroma. It is easy to cook and tastes great when paired with curries and gravies.
Vijay Thick Poha is flattened rice that has been flattened into flat, light, dry flakes. It has uneven edges and a rough texture, it doesn’t have a particular aroma and a bland gentle taste.

Light and crispy, 24 Mantra Puffed Rice is made from the finest quality, organically grown and processed rice. Commonly known as murmura, puffed rice taste delicious when mixed with raw salads and seasonings and are an easy to prepare, healthy snack.

Pulses are a boon to vegetarians and vegans. Legumes including Toor dal are of major importance in our diet contributing as the main source of plant protein. Among legumes, Toor dal is predominantly grown and consumed in India and is also known as red gram and arhar dal. We cannot find a kitchen in India without Toor dal.

Urad Dal is used for various purposes besides retaining the skins and also has a strong flavor. It provides nutrients, such as protein, fat, and carbohydrates, and is a rich source of proteins like iron, folic acid, calcium, magnesium, potassium, and B vitamins.

Arhar Dal completes the Indian platter with its distinctive inherent flavor, fragrance and nutrition. These are wealthy source of protein and simple to digest and cook. It is tasty flavor and contains high nutritional value. It is simple to cook property.

Masoor Dal provides nutrients such as Protein & Fibre. Made of select grains and recommended by Chef Sanjeev Kapoor and Chef Ranveer Brar, Tata Sampann Unpolished Masoor Dal makes for a delicious meal choice. So, whenever you are in the mood to cook something easy and delicious, dive into the scrumptious taste of Tata Sampann pulses, and enjoy a lovely meal!

Green Peas are small dark green colour pea mainly available in the winter seasons. Green Peas are a good source of iron, minerals, and Vitamins and fairly low in calories. You can enjoy the taste of Green peas in every season with these packed dried peas.

Rajma is high in protein and a good source of cholesterol-lowering fiber. It is made into a delicious dal, commonly eaten with steamed rice. These are an outstanding supply of folate, manganese and dietary fibre. It is a fine supply of protein, phosphorus, copper, thiamine (vitamin B1), iron, potassium and magnesium.
24 Mantra Red poha is prepared from trampled Organic red rice. The rice is easily digestible and is great for an evening or morning snacks. the rice used for this grown organically.

Fortune Sunflower Oil is a light, healthy and nutritious cooking oil. Being rich in vitamins and consisting mainly of polyunsaturated fatty acids, it makes food easy to digest. It helps to strengthen the immune system and good for heart health as well.

This oil is a unique blend of 5 oils such as Sesame Oil, which mitigates evil, Coconut Oil helps in concentration and peace of mind, Mohua for Illupai - prosperity and Rice Bran Oil, which is the simplest offering to Goddess Annalakshmi.

GRB Ghee is clarified butter that is usually prepared from cow's milk. It is the clean butterfat left over after the milk solids and water are removed from butter. Ghee is good supply of energy and gives energy to human body.
Fortune Rice Bran Oil, 100% rice bran oil, had a superior content of Oryzanol. It is the healthiest ripe oil in India.

Fresho brings you the best quality ghee in its purest form. It provides you with all the essential good fats that help maintain a healthy heart. Fresho's Pure Cow Desi Ghee is sure to enhance the taste of your dishes as it is made in a traditional home-style method and has no added preservatives or colors.

product_name: Saffola Gold Healthy Lifestyle & Heart Edible Oil
product_description: A healthy heart is important for overall good health. Take small steps today to take care of your heart. Choose the right cooking oil. Saffola Gold can help keep your family heart healthy. It has a good balance of MUFA & PUFA and triple anti-oxidant system that helps improve immunity.
Natureland Organic Groundnut Oil is sweet and flavorful peanut oil obtained from cold pressing peanuts, this oil has deep yellow color with pleasant nutty aroma and sweet taste with high energy.
Organic Sugar
Desh ki Sehat, Desh ka Namak! Now celebrating 40 years of trust, Tata Salt has pioneered India’s largest vacuum evaporation technology. Untouched by hand, Tata Salt offers an assurance of Iodine.
Fortune brings you Pure and Hygienic sugar which is untouched by hands and made with No Sulphur process. Make sweets for occasions and enjoy the sweetness.
Mother’s Choice Jaggery is a healthy alternative to white sugar to sweeten your dishes, it is processed from the best quality sugarcane and is free of harmful chemicals.

Parry's Jaggery Powder is fine jaggery produced using the highest standards in hygiene. Produced in a modern factory, it is untouched by hand and is factory packed. It is easy to use, as it doesn't need to be graded, melted or strained.

Aashirvaad ensures that only good quality ingredients reach your kitchen and Aashirvaad Iodised Salt stays true to that promise. Made from natural sea salt crystals with a 4-step advantage process, Aashirvaad Iodised Salt ensures that you and your family receive pure goodness of nature, daily.

MAGGI Magic Cubes are a unique blend of carefully selected spices and herbs of the finest quality.This secret ingredient adds a burst of rich, delightful taste and aroma to your everyday homemade dishes.
Authentic blend of spices. Imparts a rich flavour, colour and aroma. Used in preparing delectable chicken gravies or curries, dishes etc.
Part of the Culinary legacy of the Mughal Empire, Biryani is made with fragrant long grain basamati rice, and meat or vegetables marinated in yoghurt and multitude of spices.
Everest Sambhar Masala uses a unique blend of spices to provide teh authentic flavour of south Indian delicacy sambhar. This ready to use powder is ideal for the modern kitchen.
Everest chicken masala is the ultimate spice for preparing delectable chicken curry that gives the right balance between the spice-elements and other ingredients in the dish.
Everest Garam Masala is a select blend of 13 spices true to traditional and authentic taste. Garam Masala is known world over as a go to flavour enhancer in Indian cuisine.
Jeera has been a staple spice in Indian dishes for centuries. It is packed with aroma-locked packaging technology to keep its natural aroma and flavour intact.

Fill your kitchen with Catch Cumin Powder’s fragrance. Be it chaats, raita or curries, it is ideal for preparing several dishes at home. An authentic aroma of Cumin powder is simply beyond comparison.

One of the main ingredients that gives Indian food its taste, the Everest Turmeric Powder/Haldi adds an earthy flavour and lovely yellow colour to the food. The rich colour imparts a golden-yellow colour to all broths and curries.
Adding a spicy twist to everyday recipes, Everest Kashmiri Red Chilli Powder is a finely ground chilli powder that is used to add a rich colour and flavour to gravy and curry dishes.
